tagline: There is TV set at Dian's floor, it's hanging on the wall. if you go out of the elevator you'll see it. Powered by Meteor, not a good idea.
body:
#DianTv

在启明学院7楼的楼梯口。

你可以看到一台电视机。

就叫它DianTv吧。其实他只是个VGA显示器啊。


## 部署
1. 参考 [Meteor](http://docs.meteor.com/#quickstart)

2. 运行

    $ cd diantv
    $ meteor
name: Diantv
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
